targets.query: SELECT "run_number" FROM "dunedaq.rcif.opmon.RunInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "run_number" >0 AND $timeFilter
SELECT "state" FROM "dunedaq.appfwk.opmon.AppInfo" WHERE ("session" = '${session}') AND time > now() - 15s
SELECT "error" FROM "dunedaq.appfwk.opmon.AppInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND time > now() - 15s
SELECT max("data") FROM (SELECT last("run_time") AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.rcif.opmon.RunInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "application" )

SELECT last("data") FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_sent_count"), 1s) AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE session ='${session}' AND time > now() - 60s GROUP BY time(500ms) )
SELECT last("run_number") FROM "dunedaq.rcif.opmon.RunInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter

SELECT last("data") FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_inhibited_count"), 1s) AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE session ='${session}' AND time > now() - 60s GROUP BY time(500ms) )
SELECT last("td_sent_count") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.opmon.ModuleLevelTriggerInfo" WHERE session ='${session}' AND time > now() - 20s

SELECT sum("data") FROM (SELECT last("records_written") AS "data", "source_id" FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DataWriterInfo" WHERE ("session" = '${session}') AND time > now() - 30s GROUP BY "element" fill(null) )

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("new_td_total_count")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" ='${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("new_td_sent_count")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(count("tr_number")), 1s) FROM  "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TRCompleteInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("new_records_written")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.DataWriterInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND $timeFilter AND "new_records_written" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("td_sent_count") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("received")),1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.opmon.TriggerInfo" WHERE ("session"::tag = '${session}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "type", time($__interval)  fill(null)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT severity,time/1000000 as time,application_name,message,issue_name,host_name
FROM "ERSstream"
WHERE session='${session}' AND time/1000000 >= ${__from} AND time/1000000 <= ${__to}
ORDER BY -time

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("count")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.ctbmodules.ctbmoduleinfo.LevelTriggerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter AND "source_id"=~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.[^.]+\.llt_1$/ GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("count")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.ctbmodules.ctbmoduleinfo.LevelTriggerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter AND "source_id"=~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.[^.]+\.hlt_1$/ GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("count")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.ctbmodules.ctbmoduleinfo.LevelTriggerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter AND "source_id"=~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.[^.]+\.hlt_10$/ GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") FROM "dunedaq.ctbmodules.ctbmoduleinfo.LevelTriggerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter AND "source_id"=~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.[^.]+\.llt_1$/ GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") FROM "dunedaq.ctbmodules.ctbmoduleinfo.LevelTriggerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter AND "source_id"=~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.[^.]+\.hlt_1$/ GROUP BY "source_id", time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(distinct("bytes_output"), 1s)  / 1048576 FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datawriterinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"
fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("bytes_output")), 1s)  / 1048576 FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.tpstreamwriterinfo.Info" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"
fill(null)
